message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the urgency for me to settle due to inflation.
Your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor, Alice. This is a fairer split considering the inflation affects you more.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I acknowledge the inflation difference, but I'm also offering a faster resolution which benefits you. This is a compromise.
Alice, this back-and-forth is pointless. The value is decreasing with each round. I propose a 50/50 split to end this fairly.
